summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Villa Paris gestionale tavolo variants functionality. All core features working correctly including tavolo creation, variants management, border colors, badges, data persistence, and API integration.

ui_bugs.issue: Occasional timeout on double-click for second tavolo due to pointer event interception

passed_tests: Piantina page loads correctly at /piantina-evento/1
Page title displays correctly: 'Disposizione Sala - Matrimonio Rossi-Bianchi'
Existing tavolo T1 found with variants badge showing count: 6
Single click tavolo selection works - shows control buttons
Double click tavolo opens varianti panel successfully
Varianti panel displays correctly with title 'Varianti Tavolo T1'
Increase/decrease buttons work for all variants (vegetariano, senza_glutine, vegano)
Input fields accept direct number input for variant quantities
Save varianti button closes panel and updates tavolo successfully
Badge on tavolo shows correct total variants count
Tavolo border color changes based on predominant variante (green for vegetariano)
Badge color matches predominant variante color
+ Tavolo button creates new tavolo successfully
New tavolo can have variants added and saved
Riepilogo varianti section displays summary correctly
Save disposizione button persists data with success message
Data persistence verified - reload shows saved tavoli and variants
Backend API - all CRUD operations working for disposizioneSala
Variants data structure saved as Record<VariantId, number> format
Multiple tavoli management works correctly

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All API endpoints working correctly for tavolo variants
success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All major functionality working, minor double-click timeout issue
